name: Jeff's Story
description:
It's a game for the "I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game" Jam, the second one.

Ok so, This is my first official game lol. It has no music because I still don't know how to add some. Plus I can't make any lol.

I feel like the story is all over the place. I actually didn't write one before doing the game and then went with whatever I felt. I really just wanted to have fun making something :D

I'm really sorry if there are some writing errors but it's late and I'm kind of tired. I tried to correct every mistake I noticed.

Anyway, I hope this game will be able to make you smile a little, even if sometimes it can be a lil serious :p
